thread.title: Verizon has reportedly cut Yahoo's price by up to $350 million (YHOO)
thread.title_full: Verizon has reportedly cut Yahoo's price by up to $350 million (YHOO)

author: Akin Oyedele
title: Verizon has reportedly cut Yahoo's price by up to $350 million (YHOO)
text:
print Ethan Miller/Getty 
Yahoo and Verizon agreed to cut their deal price by up to $350 million following Yahoo's disclosure of two data breaches, according to The Wall Street Journal . 
The companies also agreed to split the costs of the breaches, according to the report. 
Bloomberg reported last week that Verizon had tentatively reached a revised deal that lowered Yahoo's price by about $250 million. 
Verizon agreed to buy Yahoo's ailing internet business last year for $4.8 billion. 
More to come ...
